widget.name: JWMiNo
widget.description:
JWMiNo stands for "Jehova's Witnesses Ministry Notes".
This is a very simple to use note taking app for Jehovas's Witnesses. Take your ministry notes quick and easy.
Features: - add/edit territories - add/edit streets - add/edit addresses (persons) - add/edit visits to that persons - filter for address list
Planned features: - send notes by email - import/export/backup - track placements
To track your service time and placements, take look at the app ServiceTime or some other apps that focus this task.
This app will be free for ever!
Keywords: JW, JW Droid, ServiceDroid, Ministry Assistant, On the Ministry
widget.author: Marco Michely
